{"id":403564185,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1601653802,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/403564185/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum Smaller","memory":"13.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int threeSumSmaller(vector<int>& nums, int target) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        int ans = 0;\n        int n = nums.size();\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n            int k = n - 1;\n            int j = i + 1;\n            while(j < k) {\n                if (nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k] < target) {\n                    ans += (k - j++);\n                } else {\n                    --k;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum-smaller"}
